item.title: Walmart In Talks to Acquire Israeli Startup To Boost Its Marketplace Security: Report
item.description: People familiar with the matter told CNBC that R&A Data has been working with Walmart as a third-party vendor since at least 2024.

item.title: Blue Owl Scraps Merger Of Funds Amid Market Uncertainty
item.description: The companies indicated they would reevaluate alternative strategies in the coming months as market conditions evolve.

item.title: Google Stock Hits $300 For First Time Ever After Announcing Gemini 3, Waymo Expansion
item.description: Google’s parent company, Alphabet’s stock climbed 6.6% to a record-high of $304 in morning trade on Wednesday.

item.title: KZIA Stock Soars After Stage IV Cancer Patient Shows Initial Complete Remission On Its Drug Combination
item.description: Kazia now plans to conduct a follow-up scan to confirm the initial scan.

item.title: David Beckham Joins Bank Of America As Ambassador For Its Global Sports Program
item.description: The bank said that the partnership will see Beckham promote Bank of America’s sports portfolio, including brands and events, to drive progress.
